docs.abstract: Presumptive Republican presidential nominee Donald J Trump adds speculation to his choice of running mate after he meets with Indiana Gov Mike Pence; says he has narrowed his list of potential nominees, which includes Newt Gingrich and New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, to 'four or five.'

headline.main: Donald Trump Expected to Announce Running Mate Before Convention
